Title: Amends the real property tax law to allow local governments to exempt un-remarried spouses of public safety officials from all or a portion of tax
Summary: Relates to exempting un-remarried spouses of paid or volunteer firefighters, ambulance workers or police officers who have fallen in the line of duty from all or a portion of their real property taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to exempting un-remarried spouses of paid or volunteer fire fighters, ambulance workers or police officers who have fallen in the line of duty from all or a portion of their real property taxes on their primary residence
